Job Description

 

Company: Hat-Trick Capital

Position Overview

 

We are seeking a talented AI Automation Specialist to join our team and help revolutionize our internal operations through cutting-edge AI technology. This role focuses on creating innovative "card-based" systems similar to Cozmobill-style applications, developing "classmatebill" or "workforaiworkfor" type platforms that will significantly accelerate the efficiency of our internal use cases.

The successful candidate will be responsible for building customer-facing applications and tools with similar functionality, while also upgrading and automating our entire internal network into a more AI-driven ecosystem. This position combines technical development with operational excellence, offering the opportunity to work with various AI tools and technologies to create scalable, efficient solutions.

Key Focus Areas

 

This role involves developing sophisticated automation systems that will transform how Hat-Trick Capital operates internally and serves its customers. You'll be working at the intersection of AI technology and business process optimization, creating tools that enhance productivity and streamline operations across the organization.

Join our innovative team and help shape the future of AI-driven business operations at Hat-Trick Capital, where you'll have the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies while making a significant impact on our organizational efficiency and customer experience.
